website_summaries.verdict: An enzyme-based stain remover that is great on food stains.
pros: Uses enzymes to break down stains and works particularly well on food-based stains
Very good at removing stains on whites
Best if clothes are washed not long after treating them

customer_reviews.title: Nothing seems to work quite as well
customer_reviews.text: My sister did her science fair project in middle school on this stain remover. She tested a few others with hard dried on stains and Zout did the best on every stain. So now years later I still use this as my stain remover and it still works just as well as ever. My most amazing story with this remover is when my son stained his paints a very dark brown on light gray sweats. The stain wasn’t treated and went through the drier. (That’s the death of a stain, sending it through the drier). But I sprayed it like crazy with Zout and sent it through the wash again anyway and the stain came completely out! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kikenie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stain reliever because I was looking for a strong enzyme-based stain treater for the clothes of my autistic son. Not only is he a very messy eater, but his hygiene is not so great, which means we frequently have stained stinky clothes. I have to admit that I was starting to go slightly crazy, but this stain reliever and Lysol laundry sanitizer have been life-changing. I feel confident if it works for our issues, it should work for almost any stain.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: This product ruined my shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I saw it was suppose to be good on set-in stains. I have a few shirts I love but I wasn't able to get the stains out, so I put this on. On the back of the bottle it says the product is safe for all colorfast washables. Per the instructions on the bottled, I scrubbed the area with a tooth brush. The t-shirt I used it on is now worse than it was with the stains on it. As you can see by my picture, it took the color right off my shirt. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY, I will never use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: even so far as calling a manufacturer for a case of product because it was so highly recommended - that one worked also
customer_reviews.text: This spray actually works. I've done the litany of products for stain removal, even so far as calling a manufacturer for a case of product because it was so highly recommended - that one worked also, but this is much easier and readily accessible. THIS IS AN EDIT TO MY REVIEW: I Still prefer this product over others, but when mine arrived, the sprayer on both did not work. LUCKILY, I had an almost empty bottle of it, so I have been forced to open the cap of the new arrivals and pour into old bottle - quite frustrating so I am lowering my star to 4.
customer_reviews.author: ipka54

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for some time. It takes stains out very well if you let it soak for a little bit prior to washing. It does leave a scent on the laundry and It can put that sent on the full load of laundry a little bit. My children have sensitive skin and have not had any reactions to this product and we use it on their clothes often to spot treat.
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: New formula is more effective.
customer_reviews.text: What I like MOST is that I can actually purchase it (through Amazon.com)! It’s like trying to buy hen’s teeth! The formula is now foam, rather than liquid, which makes sense. I did laundry today and sprayed some stains that have been there through 2-3 washes, and it is nearly completely back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Zuehl

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I keep one by the laundry hamper and one at the washing machine. Most of the time it will take whateever the stain is out. Not always all of it. But lightens it. I haven't found anything better that will take any kind of stain our of everything. I have been using this as I say for years sometimes along with liquid detergent or baking soda as well on the stain. Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite the Same
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this formula was not as good at getting out stains as the one I purchased from the grocery store. The other was a foam, but I can't seem to find it anymore. This formula is a spray, and it does not get the stains out as well as the foam. I purchased 4 bottles, and will continue to use it until I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Lady

customer_reviews.title: No stains
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase of Zout. It really works!!!!!!! has no real scent to it, gets out all the food stains I tend to get on myself, I eat in bed , back porch whereever (not a table person).way better than Shout or other products available in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Scoots

customer_reviews.title: Product works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover I have ever used. Sometimes it requires more than one application for really stubborn stains like coffee and chocolate. Just don't put it in the dryer until the stain has disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Rufi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to remove salt stains on old caps. Let me tell you this stuff works great! Sprayed on let soak 5 mins scrubbed stains with toothbrush rinsed with warm water and hung them to dry! That easy and gets look great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product on the market for eliminating stains of ALL KINDS! Don't waste your money on Shout and other products that claim they can do the same. They can't.
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: A stain remover that actually removes stains. What a concept!
customer_reviews.text: Zout is the real deal when it comes to removing stains. I had an old football jersey I dearly loved but it had so many stains from grilling etc. that it was basically banished to wearing only in the house. My wife bought Zout and now my jersey is able to make public appearances again. How can a product that only exist to remove stains, not remove stains? I am talking to you Shout! Forget Shout and buy Zout!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Although it is very effective on carpet stains, it is hard to get a decent spray aimed at the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the spray mechanism and/or the shape of the container make spraying to the floor difficult. A stronger spray or a better shape of the container may improve this fault.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I dislike nothing about this product. This is the only stain remover that I've found that will remove a grease stain after the item has been run through the dryer
customer_reviews.author: fred12065

customer_reviews.title: Spray is better
customer_reviews.text: I love Zout, it's the only one that works. I don't care for the foam, so changed out my stray head to make it spray. Heh. Zout is getting hard to find, so thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite stain remover! I have a baby and he poops on pretty much every onesie. I put zout on the stain, soak it in cold water, and lay it out in the sun to bleach the stain. It’s gone in a few hours! If not I just repeat the process until it’s fully gone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stain. Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product for difficult stains on any fabric. Always have a spray bottle of this product in your laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Sophies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Finally able to buy this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product for any kind of stain. It will even take out stains that have gone through the dryer. For set in stains, spray the stain, let sit for 24 hours, and then wash. Gone! I can no longer find Zout in my local grocery stores. I'm hoping that the company isn't discontinuing this amazing product. It even took out stains that failed to come out using Shout.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Even mouse poop was vanquished!
customer_reviews.text: My husband went to a meeting in Washington, D.C., and left a blue-striped Brooks Brothers dress shirt neatly stored in a bureau in his hotel room. The next morning, he found that the shirt was covered in mouse feces. He was resigned to throwing it out, once he returned home, but I sprayed it thoroughly with Sout, and it, along with the laundry brush, rubbed away every stain--not much, given the wonders of Sout--and saved the shirt. I washed it in warm water, and it looks fine now.
customer_reviews.author: anne eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wonder products works well and will be using again.. better than m anything I’ve found at the local level
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best stain removal product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Zout for years and now can't locate it in my local stores so was happy to be able to order online. It gets most if not all stubborn stains out and if not the first time definitely the second time. Especially when the stain is treated promptly. Best product for stain removal!
customer_reviews.author: Geeni

customer_reviews.title: Whitens white clothes the best I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: This has always been a great product. I used it with all my nursing uniforms. It removed blood and a variety of other stains and kept my whites white not yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Mattricia

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This stain remover has never failed. I love the way it works and I use it on all colors and all stains.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Zout is great for all kinds of stains & does not bleach out your clothes like some stain sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Okera

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Prefer the foam version better, the foam is more expensive & no refills available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: P Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stain remover
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent and readily available in grocery stores. Online pricing is almost double what is in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: Zout is the best product I have found to remove stains from clothing, especially grease spots. Nothing else I’ve used in the past works as well as this!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry stain remover for all fabrics
customer_reviews.text: Sour is the best stain remover- I do not use any other product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing about this product that I don't like. It takes out any kind of stain. I just removed hydraulic fluid that spilled on my friends brand new Skechers. Sprayed it on took a sm. scrub brush and after a few minutes the stains are gone. It removes blood, motor oil, grass stains etc. I've been using this for over11yrs. I simply love it. No home should be without it.
customer_reviews.author: C Lynn Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it on the little ring on collars about 5 minutes before I wash clothes. It works even better if you don't wait too long to wash your clothes
customer_reviews.author: Long Distance Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ‘leading competitor’
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value and it outperforms Spray&Wash in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend, so far has gotten all my kids' stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eichel

customer_reviews.title: Zout
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores. Works great on stains in clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Zout it the best for any type of stains
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for stains and on whites .. It takes out old stains by spraying on and letting it set in a few hours or over night . It does a really good job for the material look as new as the day you bought it .. It is the best for any type of stains of old and new stains ..
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C.

customer_reviews.title: I think Zout is the best stain remover on the market but
customer_reviews.text: I think Zout is the best stain remover on the market but, unfortunately, I cannot find it in many stores in my area. I'm thrilled to be able to buy a two-pack on Amazon. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS - especially on grease stains
customer_reviews.text: This product gets out LOTS of stains - grease stains, makeup stains, food stains.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Matt

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for stains I was a dental asst for 30+ yrs this took care of all different stains it is the best
customer_reviews.author: pat d

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Zout is an excellent product which seems to have disappeared from local shelves. It was a fair price and was delivered almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Zitomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely works for me, takes away all stains even old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Irma B Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for years! It does a great job. Doesn't smell too much. Generally a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tate

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and it has NEVER Failed!
customer_reviews.author: I Love GOD

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover made
customer_reviews.text: Best product around. This gets rid of every stain imaginable. It even gets out old oil or grease stains! Spray it, let it sit for a few hours and wash!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Best brand so far.
customer_reviews.text: As a mom, I'm always looking for the best stain remover, and Zout definitely works better than S*h*o*u*t. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: LizK

customer_reviews.title: Gets out even stubborn stains
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a long time. It became unavailable at stores near me. Gets out even stubborn stains. I will keep buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works on every stain I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product on all food stains, milk stains, grass stains, and even grease.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's the only product that actually gets rid of tough stains. For instance, I had washed a load of laundry with a tube if chapstick. Oops. Thought I ruined my husband's shorts but I used Zout on the stained area and it came out. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover out there
customer_reviews.text: Zout is the best stain remover on the market, and I can't seem to find this locally. This stuff works. It removes stains that Shout just can't conquer.
customer_reviews.author: Niesioa

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: This product will get most stains out. Best stain remover I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Childres

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective in Removing Stains - Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best stain removers on the market. We have been using it for quite a while now and haven't been disappointed. It actually removes stains and does a super job of it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: just what I ordered. More people must have found out my secret formula for getting stains out. This produce is so hard to find in the stores. mostly always sold out. Thanks for having it and will reorder soon/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: With five kids this is all I ever use for removing stains. Works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got kids. They either poop in their pants or drop all kinds of food on their clothes. I go through a bottle a month. Thankful for Zout and not having to buy new clothes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best stain cleaners. This was a great price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: artzyfartzy

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover out there
customer_reviews.text: Best stain remover out there, gets almost everything out that I throw at it, which is a lot when you have a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Tafadzwa Bwititi

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover.
customer_reviews.text: Great to get blood (from bloody noses - due to allergies and weak blood vessel) saved many sheets and pillow cases. Best product I have found!
customer_reviews.author: VTJAX

customer_reviews.title: Zout works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years for laundry stains, but it is getting hard to find. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for removing stains on clothing, carpet, etc
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Weak thought it would lessen or remove armpit stains from deodorants
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: Works like the zout that came in the push and pull version.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on all kinds of stains. Used to use the zout with the push and pull spout, but that version is no longer available. This works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Merlo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job for a fraction of the price of other "major brands". Has gotten every stain I've thrown at it -- so far. Pleasant odor. One for the laundry room and one for the upstairs bedrooms. We're covered!
customer_reviews.author: rms

customer_reviews.title: This is the spray, not the foam.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good stain treatment. I was disappointed to receive the spray instead of the foam as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Chernig

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the product it works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove spitup and it takes the stains out
customer_reviews.author: Liz Conley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Stain removal!! I've had wonderful results using Zout on all types of stains!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Fights stains like no other stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only stain remover I will use!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Corazzini

customer_reviews.title: Love the formula and the way it works
customer_reviews.text: Love the formula and the way it works...bummed that none of the squitters worked and I have to switch them out to use. Hoping it was just this batch as I have used this product for years!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This has taken out even old stains. Very hard to find in most stores so I am glad to be able to order on line.
customer_reviews.author: connie kellogg

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best stain remover ever! My wife and I use this stuff everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product takes out even OKD stains & ive used it for years! Excellent stain remover that other stain removers won’t remove!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gr

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: Zout is the best stain remover for clothes. I use it on clothes that have oil stains and stains that my grandchildren add to their clothes. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for removing stains. Nothing else comes close.
customer_reviews.author: dawa34444

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market for stains!
customer_reviews.text: A great product that is impossible to find in the grocery store. Works so well on carpet pet stains and more.

customer_reviews.title: the best !
customer_reviews.text: the best stain remover on the market - even does a credible job on old stains ! Nurses recommend it for blood stains, too.
customer_reviews.author: nancy forton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work as well as Shout or Oxy Clean. Smells awful and had to use twice as much to try to get some of the stains out. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Best Stain Remover on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover on the market but unfortunately so hard to find in local supernarkets. This removes just about any stain you will get on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA R.

customer_reviews.title: My wife swears by Zout
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by Zout, over any other stain remover out there—and believe me, she's tried a dozen and more!
customer_reviews.author: PogeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not Foam
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars - if it is the foam you are after, don’t waste your time. This is advertised as Zout Foam but you get Zout spray instead. If you are specifically looking for the foam, do not order this. We tried twice and received the spray both times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Do it is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Do it gets rid of stains better than all the name brand products I've used...which have been many.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of spot remover and this is the beat

customer_reviews.title: Great for grease
customer_reviews.text: I work in a restaurant and it removes all the stains

customer_reviews.text: This gets the grease out of my iron worker husbands clothes like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Works on Everything
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stain remover I use. It is the only one that works on just about everything.

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works on all laundry stain like nothing else. The best stuff

customer_reviews.title: I liked it that it came early.
customer_reviews.text: Getting spots out of a sweat shirt, and I used it to get some spots out of the carpet before I cleaned it.

customer_reviews.title: Handy washing tool
customer_reviews.text: We have used Zout for many years and would not use anything else.

customer_reviews.text: I love this product for removing laundry stains. Even set in stains. The product arrived on time.

customer_reviews.title: this really works!
customer_reviews.text: My family gives me plenty of dirty, stained clothes to use this on. I'm happy for a product that gets out almost 100% of stains out.

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, it’s the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Zout will remove stains that other laundry stain removers fail to remove. I’ve used this product for years. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of all the stain removers. I've no idea why everyone hasn't discovered it. This one really works!

customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing & gets out so many stains!

customer_reviews.title: It is great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray all the time for cleaning spots on clothes. It is great.

customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Only 3 stars because I didn’t receive the ‘foam’ version, instead I received the regular spray.

product_meta.title: Zout Triple Enzyme Formula Laundry Stain Remover Foam - 22 oz - 2 pk
feature_bullets: Amylase for starch stain like BBQ sauce, chocolate syrup, tomato sauce, and baby food
Zout Formula is safe on a washables.
